remarks.para: May be inoperative deactivated in the Port C closed position provided two packs are operated continuously while valve is deactivated.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operate two continuously. Shut down of all packs will deprive the flight instruments of cooling airflow.

placard.para: Placard "EE 3WAY VLV INOP" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To deactivate the THREE-WAY VALVE (Port C):
Open circuit breaker EQPT COOLING INB VLV CONT (C10237), A14 on the P414 panel.
Gain access to the three-way valve by removing LH forward cargo side wall lining at STA 592.
Disconnect, cap, and stow the valve's electrical connector.
To position the valve in the Port C closed position:
Ensure two or three packs are operating before proceeding to next step.
Insert a No. 2 Phillips screwdriver (or equivalent) into the valve's manual override hole and rotate the valve until the indicator is midway between the Port A and Port B indicator arrows.
Close the circuit breaker EQPT COOLING INB VLV CONT (C10237), A14 on the P414 panel opened in Step 1 above.
